name: 1-ChanceCleaner
description:
This game is made for the GMKT Game Jam 2019 with the "Only One" theme.

In this game you will have to defeat a powerful virus before it finishes running.
Since the theme of the GMKT Game Jam 2019 is "Only One", this game is played only with the mouse, the cursor to aim and the left button to shoot.

In addition, it also has a special design component and is that you can only PLAY ONCE to the game if you lose because it will DELETE itself from your computer.

CONTROLS:

Mouse to aim.

Left Mouse Button to shoot.

NOTE:

THE ERASE FEATURE DOESN'T WORK IF YOU PUT THE GAME FOLDER INSIDE ANOTHER ONE(For path issues). WORKS IN ANY SYSTEM FOLDER BUT NOT IN A NEW ONE CREATE BY YOU.PUT THE GAME FOLDER IN THE DESKTOP IS THE BEST WAY.
